name: 不羈幻晶
description: 稜晶首次現世之時，有人掌握了操縱其魔力的方法。但在遙遠的北方，水晶的腐化早已根深蒂固、深入地表。這裡充滿碎晶般的樹木，以及五彩斑斕的空氣。曾為人類的居民與各方生命體聯手，與殘存的文明展開了一場戰爭，萬物必將閃爍著稜晶的光芒。

wikiSkinData.lore: Once a humble fisherman, Xerath returned from a voyage with a multitude of magical crystals in tow. Their power elevated him to become a leader of his people, ushering in what he hoped would be a new era of the Prismae Crystals' rule. But the cost of such power damaged his mind, leaving him suspicious that no thoughts are to be trusted… even his own.

skins.name: 不羈幻晶 納帝魯斯

wikiSkinData.lore: Long ago, Nautilus had been a fisherman by his friend Xerath's side. Together the two discovered a mass of powerful crystals, and greed drove his comrade to cast Nautilus into the water to drown. A single crystal sustained him and, as he slumbered, corrupted and empowered his body and mind. But even this could not destroy his strongest desire—revenge.

To citizens of Crystalis Motus, the being known as Kha'Zix is a purely crystalline horror whose hunger to assimilate life knows no limits. To those in the north, however, it is a marvel: a being shaped by the crystals themselves into a near perfect form, and whose zeal to spread the Prismae's power is inspirational.
